abstract: Albert L. Lord will receive $224.9 million for his stock options as part of the company’s $25 billion takeover.
snippet: Albert L. Lord will receive $224.9 million for his stock options as part of the company’s $25 billion takeover.
lead_paragraph: Albert L. Lord, the chairman of the SLM Corporation, the parent of Sallie Mae, will receive $224.9 million for his stock options as part of the company’s $25 billion takeover by a group led by the private equity firm J. C. Flowers & Company.

headline.main: Sallie Mae Chairman’s Payout Is Tallied
headline.print_headline: Sallie Mae Chairman’s Payout Is Tallied
